title: 2025 Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix start time: how to watch, live stream and F1 schedule
summary: Round 7 of the 2025 Formula 1 season takes us to the Imola for the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix. These are all the dates, start times and sessions you need to know about
